Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-ECa  (temporin-1Re, Leu-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; UCLL1; XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: Skin Secretions,Euphlyctis cyanophlyctis,  Asia;Pelophylax kl. esculentus, Europe.

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli HP101BA 7601c (MIC 12.3 uM), K. pneumonia PTCC1388 (MIC 9.8 uM), M. luteus PTCC1625 (MIC 8.3 uM), and S. aureus PTCC1431 (MIC 10.6 uM).Toxicity: hRBC: 2.3% hemolysis at 59.2 uM. Provided by Adel Ghorani-Azam and Ahmad Asoodeh.In 2016, the same sequence was also reported byChen X et al., 2016as temporin-1Re from the skin secretion of the European edible frog, Pelophylax kl. esculentus. This is a C-terminally amidated form. Found in multiple species. Updated 6/2016; 7/2021.
Literature Information.Author: Ahmad A, Ghorani-Azam A, Chamani J Kh 2012
Literature Information.Title: Identification and Characterization of Novel Antibacterial Peptides from Skin Secretions of Euphlyctis cyanophlyctis
